JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description     ** PLEASE APPLY ONLY IF :      You have good hands on experience on Manual and Automated Software Testing and you are thoroughly clear about software testing life cycle  (kindly mention the relevant project specifics in your resume with your role and responsibilities in the projects)    You are willing to work on the mentioned pay-scale.      ** ANY APPLICATIONS NOT MEETING THESE CRITERIA WILL BE IGNORED **    For freshers, this experience can also be on college level projects. While sending in your resume, clearly mention the projects worked on in the relevant technologies, along with your role in the project, duration of the project and your key learning from the project.    Key Job responsibilities of hired candidates:      Manual and Automated Testing of web and mobile software    Work closely with Management, Customers, QA, Design, Product Management, and Customer Support to maintain and enhance existing products
